text: Kendrick Lamar has won the Pulitzer Prize for music, making history as the first nonclassical or jazz artist to win the prestigious prize. In this Jan. 28, 2018 file photo, rapper Kendrick Lamar accepts the award for best rap album for ` ` Damn'' at the 60th annual Grammy Awards in New York. On Monday, April 16, 2018, Lamar won the Pulitzer Prize for music for his album ` ` Damn.'' ( Matt Sayles / Invision / AP ) NEW YORK — Kendrick Lamar has won the Pulitzer Prize for music, making history as the first nonclassical or jazz artist to win the prestigious prize. The revered rapper is also the most commercially successful musician to receive the award, usually reserved for critically acclaimed classical acts who don ’ t live on the pop charts.
